miningInstructions.title: Mining Instructions

items.label: Reward Condition
items.value: Only if you find a block

miningInstructions.note: ** The 1% fee will be fully refunded to your rewards during the promotional period.

items.label: Fishing Miners:
items.value: Earnings are based on valid sharenotes and payouts are processed once every 24 hours.

items.label: Solo Miners:
items.value: You receive full payout instantly when a block is found. No block, no reward.

items.label: Important:
items.value: Before setting your payout address, please carefully verify that it is correct and valid. Once payments are sent, they cannot be modified, canceled, or recovered.

questions.q: Can I use multiple workers in the Fishing Pool?
questions.a: Yes. You can use the same address with different worker names. Each worker name must be unique.

questions.q: How often are earnings calculated in the Fishing Pool?
questions.a: Earnings are calculated in real time based on submitted sharenotes and payouts are processed once every 24 hours.

questions.q: How are rewards handled in the Solo Pool?
questions.a: You receive the full block reward immediately after finding and submitting a valid block.

questions.q: Can I change my payout address?
Is there a minimum payout amount?
questions.a: No. Payouts are automatic regardless of the amount once settlement or block confirmation is complete.

questions.q: What happens if my miner disconnects?
questions.a: If your device goes offline, it stops submitting sharenotes. No rewards are earned until it reconnects.

questions.q: When are rewards confirmed and paid?
questions.a: In the Fishing Pool, rewards are paid after 300-block maturity. In the Solo Pool, rewards are paid instantly upon valid block submission.

support.title: Support
support.detail: Need support? Join the <1>#mining</1> channel on the Flokicoin Discord server, or DM us directly at <1>Fpool</1>.
